body: So, Many of you may know (and hate me). To those who don't, my name is President_Pepe, I record Minecraft for my show Minecraft Central (debuting soon). And just for the sake of honesty, yes I have a bad record but in my defense most of my griefs are revenge griefs after someone does the same to me.

title: Lets Return to the Basics...My Name is Pepe

replies.body:
Hello :3!!! good night!!! But the revenge is bad, did you forgot that? If you saw a griefer report it, don't repair with more griefing, It's like violence with more violence, it hasn't any sence. Please do not do that anymore!!!
And hi! I am Ivan, Like to meet you <3
